bibl.title: Charlatans or Saviours? Posidippus' Epigram AB 95 in the Context of Hellenistic Epigrams on Doctors.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The paucity of Hellenistic epigrams on doctors. - 3. Doctors in Hellenistic epigrams. - 4. General characteristics of physicians in the epigrams. - 5. Posidippus' epigram on Medeus of Olynthus. - 6. Conclusion.

bibl.title: with the Assistance of A. AMBÜHL, Nature and Science in Hellenistic Poetry

bibl.seg: KLOOSTER Jacqueline, Charlatans or Saviours? Posidippus' Epigram AB 95 in the Context of Hellenistic Epigrams on Doctors.
M.A. HARDER, R.F. REGTUIT and G.C. WAKKER (Edd.), with the Assistance of A. AMBÜHL, Nature and Science in Hellenistic Poetry = Hellenistica Groningana. 15 (Leuven, 2009) pp. 57-77.

1. Introduction. - 2. The paucity of Hellenistic epigrams on doctors. - 3. Doctors in Hellenistic epigrams. - 4. General characteristics of physicians in the epigrams. - 5. Posidippus' epigram on Medeus of Olynthus. - 6. Conclusion.
